heading: Regal Romance: Udaipur's Palatial Splendor Revealed

itinerary.day1Overview: Upon arrival at Udaipur airport, railway station or bus stop, meet Tour My India representatives who help you with hotel transfer. Rest of the day will be free for leisure. In the evening, you will go for a boat ride on lake Pichola to visit the Jag Mandir. Overnight stay at the Udaipur hotel.

itinerary.day2Overview: After breakfast, go for Udaipur sightseeing tour. You will visit all the famed attractions like City Palace, Jagdish Temple, Fateh Sagar Lake, Saheliyon ki Bari and Bhartiya Lok Kala Mandir. Overnight stay at the Udaipur hotel.

itinerary.day3Overview: Post breakfast, you will be transferred to airport or railway station for your journey onwards.

inclusions: Entrance fees (Cable and car and Moon Valley)
Box lunch water, banana apple and chocolate

overview.heading: Discovering Rajasthan's Splendor: History, Culture, and Scenic Marvels Await
overview.text: Embark on a journey to Rajasthan, a land of royal opulence, rich history, and diverse landscapes. This captivating state in India beckons travelers with its majestic forts, vibrant markets, and a tapestry of cultural traditions that unfold against the backdrop of desert landscapes.

overview.heading: Regal Fortresses
overview.text: Rajasthan is adorned with magnificent forts, each narrating tales of valor and grandeur. Explore the regal forts of Jaipur, Jodhpur, and Jaisalmer, marveling at the architectural prowess that has stood the test of time.

overview.heading: Cultural Extravaganza
overview.text: Immerse yourself in the cultural richness of Rajasthan. Wander through the bustling bazaars of Udaipur, where artisans showcase intricate handicrafts. Indulge in the flavors of Rajasthani cuisine, a delightful blend of spices and culinary traditions.

overview.heading: Spiritual Odyssey
overview.text: Rajasthan houses spiritual havens amidst its golden dunes. Visit the sacred temples of Pushkar and witness the spiritual aura at the Brahma Temple. Explore the intricately carved temples of Ranakpur, a testament to the region's religious diversity.

overview.heading: Desert Adventures
overview.text: For adventure enthusiasts, Rajasthan offers unique experiences amidst its desert landscapes. Take a camel safari in the Thar Desert, camp under the starlit sky, or explore the sand dunes of Khimsar. Rajasthan's deserts unfold as an adventurous playground.

overview.heading: Preserving Heritage
overview.text: While Rajasthan's heritage is timeless, efforts are made to preserve its cultural and architectural marvels. Conservation initiatives and responsible tourism practices aim to safeguard the state's heritage for generations to come.

overview.heading: Plan Your Rajasthan Sojourn
overview.text: Whether captivated by history, intrigued by diverse cultures, or seeking the thrill of desert landscapes, Rajasthan promises an enchanting experience. Plan your sojourn to this regal realm, where every corner reveals a piece of the past and every moment is a cultural revelation.
